scripts.migrate:status: node -e "const db = require('./db'); db.query('SELECT migration_name, executed_at, status FROM migrations ORDER BY executed_at DESC').then(([rows]) => { console.log('JavaScript Migrations:'); console.table(rows); }).catch(() => console.log('No migrations table found')); db.query('SELECT migration_name, executed_at, status FROM sql_migrations ORDER BY executed_at DESC').then(([rows]) => { console.log('\nSQL Migrations:'); console.table(rows); }).catch(() => console.log('No sql_migrations table found')); db.close();"
